title: Don’t wait for Prime Day to score this refurbished 16GB iPad Air for under $130!
content:
Macworld

Refurbished tech is always a great way to save a few bucks, and you can curb electronic waste while you’re at it. But if that’s not enough of an incentive, the pot just got a lot sweeter!

Thanks to our Deal Days savings event, our version of Prime Day, you can now get an iPad Air with 16GB of storage for only $129.97 if you act before October 15th. No coupon is necessary!

This iPad was awarded a Grade B refurbishment rating, which means it’s been restored to full working order with the exception of some possible light scuffing on the case. 

This is Apple’s 2013 edition of the iPad Air, and it’s full of features that make it just as well suited for light use as it was when it first came out. The Apple A7 processor makes for smooth surfing, and the 5MP iSight camera takes great vacation snaps. You’re sure to enjoy games, scrolling through social media, and streaming with this pre-loved iPad Air’s 9.7″ touch-sensitive Retina display.

During Deal Days, get this refurbished 9.7″ iPad Air in Space Gray for just $129.97. No coupon is required, but this deal ends October 15th at 11:59pm Pacific!
